column3: Latest;Koh Kong: On a raid this month
column4: Wildlife Alliance’s WRRT seized 71kg of bushmeat
column6: and more than 50kg of turtle carapaces and plastrons from a restaurant in Koh Kong province.------The team released the turtles back into the wild and destroyed the wildlife meat. Wildlife Alliance is calling on people to stop eating wildlife as part of our ------#StopEatingWildlife------ campaign.------Wildlife consumption is decimating Cambodia’s wildlife and is a direct threat to the public health of the Cambodian people.
